mixed-citation.named-content: Berlandina artaxerxes Zamani & Chatzaki & Esyunin & Marusik 2021, sp. nov.
mixed-citation.article-title: One new genus and nineteen new species of ground spiders (Araneae: Gnaphosidae) from Iran, with other taxonomic considerations

tp:treatment-sec.p:
The new species is most similar to
B. venatrix (O. Pickard-Cambridge, 1874)
and
B . koponeni Marusik, Fomichev & Omelko, 2014
by having a broad embolar base ( Eb ) with a similar sclerotized apical outgrowth ( Ao ) parallel to a bent, long embolus and a basal process ( Po ). In the new species, the two

elements of the embolar base are pointed (vs shallowly divided with the process small and curved in
B . koponeni
; see
Marusik et al. 2014
: figs 32, 34, and the basal process bearing a very pointed sclerotized tooth in
B. venatrix
; see Levy 1995 : fig. 57, not present in
B. artaxerxes
sp. nov. ). Also, the median apophysis in
B. artaxerxes
sp. nov. is bent prolaterally and located under the apical outgrowth’s curve (vs straight and longer, reaching the height of the embolus in
B. koponeni
; see
Marusik et al. 2014
: figs 34–35).

tp:treatment-sec.p: The specific epithet is a noun in apposition and refers to Ardashir I (equivalent to Greek Artaxérxēs), the founder of the Sasanian Empire.

Habitus as in Fig. 3A . Total length 5.55. Carapace 2.95 long, 2.15 wide. Eye sizes and interdistance of PMEs:AME = 0.13, ALE = 0.13, PME = 0.13, PLE = 0.15, PME–PME = 0.07. Carapace, sternum, labium, chelicerae and maxillae yellowish brown; carapace with small dark submarginal patches. Chelicera with a small tooth on promargin and a serrated, bifurcate keel on retromargin. Legs the same color as carapace, without annulations. Abdomen gray, without any clear pattern, although some brown markings are visible. Spinnerets light brown and uniform in color. Measurements of legs: I: 7.00 (1.95, 1.12, 1.54, 1.31, 1.08), II: 6.29 (1.68, 1.08, 1.24, 1.26, 1.03), III: 5.04 + missing Ta (1.62, 0.99, 0.94, 1.49, Ta missing), IV: 8.58 (2.25, 1.20, 1.49, 2.39, 1.25).
Known only from the type locality in Yazd Province , central Iran .
